description: Merges one segmentation into another, replacing the source voxels with those from the merge segmentation where non-zero.

segid.title: Segmentation Index
segid.description: Segmentation index (optional). If specified, all the voxels in the merge seg will be set to segindex.

segid_only.title: Segmentation Index Only
segid_only.description: Only take segindex from merge and use it for merging.

segid_erode.title: Erode Segmentation Index
segid_erode.description: Erode seg-only segindex before merge. Specify the number of erosion iterations.

ctab.title: Color Table
ctab.description: Color table to embed in the output segmentation.
